name: Tractor beam
description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, the defender receives 1 tractor beam token. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value: 3. Range: 1-3.

name: Flechette Cannon
description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token. Then cancel all dice results. Range: 1-3. Attack value: 3.

name: Ion Cannon
description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value: 3. Range: 1-3.

name: “Mangler” Cannon
description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. When attacking, you may change 1 of your {hit} results to a {critical} result. Attack value: 3. Range: 1-3.

name: Autoblaster
description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Your {hit} results cannot be cancelled by defense dice. The defender may cancel {critical} results before {hit} results. Attack value: 3. Range: 1.

name: Heavy Laser Cannon
description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all your {critical} results to {hit} results. Attack value: 4. Range: 2-3.
